channel.title: Brodie Robertson
channel.description:
For all general enquiries feel free to contact me through any social media service listed below, If you'd like to longer form something longer form like fan mail or you have a video suggestion, feel free to send me an email.
If you'd like to chat, then come join my Discord: https://brodierobertson.xyz/discord All of the scripts and configs that I write are available on my GitHub. Email: brodierobertsonbusiness@gmail.com

item.title: SteamOS Is Not a Replacement For Windows
item.description:
Valve finally updated the SteamOS page after 3 years of the Steam Deck being released and it looks like they're getting ready for more devices to use it but keep in mind, that SteamOS is not a replacement for Windows and they explicitly say that.
==========Support The Channel========== ‚ñ∫ Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon ‚ñ∫ Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal ‚ñ∫ Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay ‚ñ∫ Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa

item.title: Mozilla Pocket and Fakespot Are Being Culled
item.description:
I'm not big on the whole browser extension thing but there are 2 extensions from Mozilla that have been quite popular which are quite unceremoniously being killed off, Pocket and Fakespot
==========Support The Channel========== ‚ñ∫ Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon ‚ñ∫ Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal ‚ñ∫ Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay ‚ñ∫ Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa

item.title: Is Linux Finally Killing 35 Year Old x86 CPUs
item.description:
Back in 2012 support for i386 CPUs were dropped and back a few years ago there was talk to drop i486 support but that didn't end up going through so now there's another shot at making this happen.
==========Support The Channel========== ‚ñ∫ Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon ‚ñ∫ Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal ‚ñ∫ Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay ‚ñ∫ Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa

item.title: Steam Deck Compatibility Got A Whole Lot More Useful
item.description:
Valve has provided Steam Deck compatibility ratings for quite a while now but this has just been expanded out to SteamOS in general, but it would be amazing to see what ProtonDB does brought in as well.
==========Support The Channel========== ‚ñ∫ Patreon: https://brodierobertson.xyz/patreon ‚ñ∫ Paypal: https://brodierobertson.xyz/paypal ‚ñ∫ Liberapay: https://brodierobertson.xyz/liberapay ‚ñ∫ Amazon USA: https://brodierobertson.xyz/amazonusa
==========Resources========== SteamOS Compatibility: https://store.steampowered.com/news/group/4145017/view/532097310616717410 ProtonDB: https://www.protondb.com/ DeckyLoader: https://github.com/SteamDeckHomebrew/decky-loader Steam Deck Compatibility: https://partner.steamgames.com/doc/steamdeck/compat
